title: Cirque Du Freak
description: Librarian's Note: this is an alternate cover edition - ISBN 13: 9780006754169I was an ordinary boy,until I visited the Cirque Du Freak...until I met Madam Octa... until I cameface to face with a creature of the night.That's when my life changed completely.I don't expect you to believe me, buteverything I describe in this bookis absolutely true...
author: Darren Shan
